description: AbstractPhysicalSpace is the abstract superclass for all types of physical spaces. Physical space refers to spaces that are fully or partially bounded by physical objects.

properties.name: lod1TerrainIntersectionCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the terrain intersection curve of the physical space in Level of Detail 1.

properties.name: lod2TerrainIntersectionCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the terrain intersection curve of the physical space in Level of Detail 2.

properties.name: lod3TerrainIntersectionCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the terrain intersection curve of the physical space in Level of Detail 3.

properties.name: pointCloud
properties.description: Relates to a 3D PointCloud that represents the physical space.
